name: Bright 2: Scavengers
description:
Welcome to Bright 2: Scavengers

home of the free

Here's what this games got so far:

  • Resource gathering with 6 tiers of blocks to collect and 12 items to gather.
  • Basic crafting recipes allow you to refill bullets, process wood, and do other stuff.
  • Fully features multiplayer allowing you and your friends to group up, split up, or murder up one another. 
  • very pretty graphics (at least i think so). 
  • fully featured saving letting you pick up right where you left off.

Here's what's next for the game:

  • New block tiers.
  • New weapons.
  • New fun items like televisions, harmonicas, and bionic arms.
  • New crafting recipes for survival items or other items like campfires.
  • UI improvements and UX improvements. 
  • Optimizations and systemization for faster content updates.
Here's the basic controls: 
  • [WASD] to move.
  • Hold [TAB] to enter the inventory.
  • [Mouse 1] to preform primary attack.
  • [Mouse 2] to preform secondary attack (melee only).
  • Hold [Q] and press [Mouse 1] to build.
  • Press [Escape] to close the game.
